member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Window.#ctor(ConsoleApplication1.Game)
member.summary: Creates and initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Window.OnUpdateFrame(OpenTK.FrameEventArgs)
member.summary: Occurs when an update is possible.
member.param: Arguments of a frame, with the time spent since the last update.

member.name: M:ConsoleApplication1.Window.OnRenderFrame(OpenTK.FrameEventArgs)
member.summary: Occurs when an render is possible.
member.param: Arguments of a frame, with the time spent since the last render.
